title: Ticket #2202: Failure during stage-in not handled properly for cream jobs
description:
If the gridmanager restarts during stage-in of a cream job, the gridmanager assumes stage-in has finished and tells cream to submit the job to the back-end scheduler. This will lead to failures due to missing or incomplete input files, which may not be detected at the CREAM/Condor layer.

The gridmanager needs to record something in the job ad when stage-in is complete so that it knows when it needs to retry it during recovery. Ideally, it would detect which file to resume from.
